Changelog
=========

0.3 - 2008-04-10
----------------

* Declarer's declarations don't track with changes to the
  class method's declarations.

* Isolate declarations on the declarer's class from declarations on
  instances.

0.2 - 2008-04-09
----------------

* Improve README.txt with clearer examples

0.1 - 2008-04-08
----------------

* Initial release
